Activity: Arrive at the office, settle in, and check emails for any urgent requests or updates from @PM-1 regarding project timelines or deliverables. Respond to any immediate concerns.

Begin researching industry best practices and regulatory requirements (SEC) for accounting policies and procedures specific to market-neutral statistical arbitrage funds targeting UHNWIs. Focus on understanding the nuances of these types of funds.
Start drafting a preliminary outline of the accounting policies and procedures document. Include sections on valuation, revenue recognition, expense allocation, and NAV calculation.

Email @LEGAL-1 and @COMP-1 to schedule a brief meeting to discuss the legal and compliance considerations related to the accounting policies and procedures. @LEGAL-1 @COMP-1 Subject: Accounting Policies & Procedures - Legal and Compliance Review.

Attend meeting with @LEGAL-1 and @COMP-1. Discuss the preliminary outline of the accounting policies and procedures, address their concerns and incorporate their feedback. Take detailed notes for revisions.

Begin refining the accounting policies and procedures document based on the feedback received. Pay special attention to areas highlighted by Legal and Compliance, ensuring all aspects are compliant with SEC regulations.

Review the updated accounting policies and procedures document. Prepare a list of outstanding questions or areas requiring further clarification from @LEGAL-1 or @COMP-1. End of Day: Prepare to leave.
